My research lies at the intersection of **digital and development economics**. More specifically, I assess the economic, social and political impact of telecommunications infrastructures and networks, particularly in developing countries. My recent research also focuses on the **role of digital platforms** in the evolution of the labor market, and on democratic dynamics in these same contexts. I am also interested in the economics of industrial organization.

I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at [CREST (Télécom Paris, Institut Polytechnique de Paris)](https://www.telecom-paris.fr/fr/ecole/departements-enseignement-recherche/sciences-economiques-sociales). I am also an Associate Researcher at [UMR Développement & Sociétés (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, IRD)](https://umr-devsoc.pantheonsorbonne.fr/).

I hold a PhD in Economics from the Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne.
